alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Broome, southwestern Madison, Cortland, southeastern Chemung, central Tioga, southeastern Tompkins and northwestern Chenango Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cuyler to Lockwood. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Homer, Caroline, Virgil, Morrisville, Dryden, Berkshire, Richford, Truxton and Solon. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 9 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Tioga; Tompkins
